title: So i got a perma ban
body:
I understand that the game i got perma banned for was me being toxic and it was stupid of me. It was a little back and forth between me and the enemy player and they didnt get punished. Is there any way for me to try and prove that i can be better and get unbanned? And also one of my games was a joke between my friend. We were joke flaming each other and I guess someone reported me.



Edit: I wasn't a complete toxic person. You can look at my logs and generally i was trying to keep my team together in ranked. We all have slip ups and im only human. I try to be positive most games its just the specific day I was having some shit happen and i know thats no excuse but in times like that you can't control stuff that happens. It's pathetic and i hope eventually my account will be given a second chance. Rito pls.

replies.body:
No. You can't undo a permaban.

Make a new account and start over.

Well kinda hard to start over when you spent over 500$ on the game for the past 5 years. Sucks man. Money doesn't grow on trees. I have heard of people getting unbanned and being put on a watch list to be better. You can remove my chat completely and i would be fine with it. I just dont want all that money going away. And also one of the games i got banned for was a joke flame to a friend. We were taking digs at each other as a joke.

> [{quoted}](name=epwmolter,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fbGvXk3Y,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-11-29T03:57:32.300+0000)
>
> Well kinda hard to start over when you spent over 500$ on the game for the past 5 years. Sucks man. Money doesn't grow on trees. I have heard of people getting unbanned and being put on a watch list to be better. You can remove my chat completely and i would be fine with it. I just dont want all that money going away. And also one of the games i got banned for was a joke flame to a friend. We were taking digs at each other as a joke.

Accounts are free.
Of course they are but skins and champions aren't. I've spent money on rp for those things.
Then you should have stopped being toxic in chat after you received a 14 day ban. It's called responsibility.

I have emotions. I was getting better but shit man sometimes people lash out when it gets too much. I didn't even lash out hard. Its not like I was the only person guilty of being toxic in that game. And the other one was just a joke to my friend.

We get it, but you're expected to not let those emotions take over repeatedly. You seem very reasonable now, but the facts are you broke the rules enough times to get perma'd. You're welcome to make a support ticket pleading your case, but as a rule Riot doesn't overturn permanent bans unless they were made in error.

Just got perma banned today, correct. All my "warnings" were given to me back in 2014, I was good this whole time. Matter a fact, I haven't even played the game in 8 months, started it back up 4 days ago. I flame a Lulu who is running down mid til mid laner had 15 kills, 10 min in, she reports me TA-DA perma banned due toxicity. I already tried, and i've read logs from years ago, they aren't going to lift your ban. So start a new account, and save yourself the trouble they don't care. If they did, they would take into consideration the gap between offenses. or be like Videogame Dunkey, and never play this game again because being banned for flamming a moron, shouldn't get you banned.
Yeah i already have my new account to 30. Sucks that riot doesn't care for its community. They talk about fixing the ban system but they never do.

I'm honor 5 on three accounts and my main was banned for two games: one for saying a zero tolerance phrase once 4 years ago (put me on "thin ice") then another for saying "oom" 10 times in a row (usually results in 10 day chat restriction, unless you're on thin-ice). 

So no, even if you're a nice guy, you'll have no chance of getting it back.
People have been given second chances before.

honestly this game has the most ridiculous system for player bans, everyone should just duo queue and report everyone you can for any type of negative response. Its almost like riot doesn't want you to respond to any type of negative comments.
You already had the opportunity to improve your behavior, following your other punishments. You didn't do so.

Considering my punishments were months and even years apart i mean I was improving but shit days and people set people off. One wasn't even towards a rando. Im only human and have human responses. All i can do is get better and i am working on it. Its not like my toxicity was daily. I have my bad qualities and every person in league gets pissed off sometimes. Don't tell me you haven't.
